formatted_address: E Coast Park Service Rd, Singapore
name: Xtreme SkatePark

reviews.text:
üõπüõºüõ¥Xtreme Skate Park is a fun place for everyone, young and not so young; expert and amateur.
The Xtreme Skate Park is free access.
üõπüõºüõ¥The Skate Park is well designed. Its flooring is anti-skid and water absorbent. Great for tropical weather.
üõπüõºThere are decks, bowls, handrails, stairsets, ramps, bumps, planters, benches, and others.
üõºAlthough its named as Xtreme Skate Park, they are great for Rollerblade and Scooters too.
üõºüõπCome visit the Skate Park to watch or have fun.
üõºüõπRemember to wear protective gears to prevent serious injuries.
üõπüõºBring your water bottle along.
Nice big outdoor skatepark for all ages and all levels! Parking is available nearby and conveniently located in East Coast Park. üëçüèª
Extreme indeed. Impressive to see little ones fly around. However, don't try to be a cool parent. I ended up with a broken ankle at the "tender" age of 40.

This place is amazing besides having many varieties of ramps they also have two enormous bowl and they even have and seating area underneath the shade and there are ramps for beginners and pros but there is a wasp nest at one of the ramps the last time I went that‚Äôs why it is only getting 4 stars
As the name suggests it's a SkatePark . Usually gets busy by evening.
